author: W. E. Messamore
title: The Housing Market Crash’s First Victims Won’t Be Homeowners
description: The devastation wrought by the coronavirus is about to trigger a wave of mortgage defaults, which was what caused the housing market crash. The post The Housing Market Crash’s First Victims Won’t Be Homeowners appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Mortgage servicers face a potentially catastrophic loss in the wake of coronavirus, leading to a housing market crash.
